mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM articles WHERE user_id = u.id) as totalArticles, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follows WHERE follow_id = u.id) as followersCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follows WHERE user_id = u.id) as followingCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article_favorites af JOIN articles a ON af.article_id = a.id WHERE a.user_id = u.id) as totalFavoritesReceived, u.created_at as createdAt FROM users u WHERE u.username = #{username}
